page.title: 19HOUSING
page.content: Our house is a large 4 bedroomed detached house situated on the main A50 road which passes through our area. The bedrooms are upstairs and also the bathroom which is small.Downstairs is a kitchen,pantry,lounge,dining room and a sun lounge.The kitchen is small but contains a sink,cupboards,fridge,deep freeze and an automatic dishwasher.We store our food in the pantry and keep the washing machine and tumble drier there.In the lounge there is a three piece suite a nest of small tables and a desk.The dining room has a large table, six chairs and a sideboard.In the sun lounge we have some rocking chairs which we are allowed to put our feet on.Our garden has two sheds which dad keeps his tools in and other things like our toys.The car is supposed to go in the garage but it is full of ladders and other large items.
